concept.title: Download and API Reference
concept.shortdesc: Download and installation can be achieved through either the use of Maven repositories or a downloaded archive, depending on the version in use.

conbody.p: Download and installation can be achieved using go get or by directly cloning our repository into your Go source tree.

section.title: Current Release (1.0.0)
section.p: Installing the Go SDK is similar to installing most other Go projects. Use go get to install the couchbase gocb:

section.title: API Documentation
section.p: As the Go SDK is still in beta and under active development, the most current and up to date API Documentation is always available through the godoc website.
